description:
Open source, lightweight, native, supports (HTTP, BitTorrent, Magnet , etc.) for downloading.

Gopeed (full name Go Speed), a high-speed downloader developed by Golang + Flutter, supports (HTTP, BitTorrent, Magnet) protocol, and supports all platforms. In addition to basic download functions, Gopeed is also a highly customizable downloader that supports implementing more features through integration with APIs or installation and development of extensions.
üÜï Features
- feat: support custom GitHub mirror config @monkeyWie (#1191)
- feat: add RPM package build @BerryMC (#1190)
- feat: add download directory placeholders, category support @copilot-swe-agent (#1188)
- feat: support webhook @copilot-swe-agent (#1187)
- feat: add support for Waterfox browser detection @monkeyWie (#1146)

- fix: defect in extension process during rename duplicate file (#1158) @Little-King2022 (#1173)
